&#8212; &#160; Nasdaq Stock Market LLC Indicate by check mark whether the registrant is an emerging growth company as defined in Rule 405 of the Securities Act of 1933 (&#167;230.405 of this chapter) or Rule 12b-2 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (&#167;240.12b-2 of this chapter). Emerging growth company &#9744; If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section&#160;13(a) of the Exchange Act. &#9744; &#160; &#160; &#160; Item&#8201;8.01. Other Events. Alphabet Inc. Euro and U.S.&#160;Dollar Senior Notes Offering On November&#160;6, 2025, Alphabet Inc. (&#8220;Alphabet&#8221;) closed its concurrent underwritten public offerings of $17.5&#160;billion aggregate principal amount of U.S. dollar-denominated senior notes (the &#8220;U.S. Notes&#8221;) and &#8364;6.5&#160;billion aggregate principal amount of euro-denominated senior notes (the &#8220;Euro Notes&#8221; and, collectively with the U.S. Notes, the &#8220;Notes&#8221;) pursuant to Alphabet&#8217;s registration statement on Form S-3 (File No.&#160;333-286752). The Notes were issued pursuant to an Indenture (the &#8220;Indenture&#8221;), dated as of February&#160;12, 2016, between Alphabet and The Bank of New York Mellon Trust Company, N.A., as trustee. The Euro Notes consist of &#8364;1,000,000,000&#160;aggregate principal amount of 2.375% notes due 2028, &#8364;1,000,000,000&#160;aggregate principal amount of 2.875% notes due 2031, &#8364;1,000,000,000&#160;aggregate principal amount of 3.125% notes due 2034, &#8364;1,000,000,000&#160;aggregate principal amount of 3.500% notes due 2038, &#8364;1,250,000,000&#160;aggregate principal amount of 4.000% notes due 2044 and &#8364;1,250,000,000&#160;aggregate principal amount of 4.375% notes due 2064. The U.S. Notes consist of $500,000,000&#160;aggregate principal amount of floating rate notes due 2028, $1,000,000,000 aggregate principal amount of 3.875% notes due 2028, $2,500,000,000 aggregate principal amount of 4.100% notes due 2030, $1,250,000,000 aggregate principal amount of 4.375% notes due 2032, $3,500,000,000 aggregate principal amount of 4.700% notes due 2035, $2,000,000,000 aggregate principal amount of 5.350% notes due 2045, $4,000,000,000&#160;aggregate principal amount of 5.450% notes due 2055&#160;and $2,750,000,000 aggregate principal amount of 5.700% notes due 2075. The foregoing description of the Indenture is qualified in its entirety by the terms of such agreement, which is filed hereto as Exhibit&#160;4.1 and incorporated herein by reference. The foregoing descriptions of the Notes is qualified in its entirety by reference to the full text of the respective forms of the Notes filed as Exhibits 4.2-4.15 hereto and each is incorporated herein by reference. Item&#8201;9.01. Financial Statements and Exhibits.
